name: Serpent
overview: Serpent, as you may have guessed already...is a Snake/Worm vairant for the Atari 8-bit line of computers. the game can be played with 1 or two players competing against each other. It was developed by Kemal Ezcan and released as part of the German Atari magazine, Zong. It was released in the 93/03 issue.
